subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Gary Sheffield, a nine-time All-Star, has hit only .119 in 17 games this season, his first in Detroit, and is hitless in his past 12 at-bats.
snippet: Gary Sheffield, a nine-time All-Star, has hit only .119 in 17 games this season, his first in Detroit, and is hitless in his past 12 at-bats.
